main.name: Sainath R. Talakanti
main.bio:
A dedicated Computer Science Graduate Student at the University of Georgia, with a passion for software development and cutting-edge technologies. My skill set includes proficiency in Java, Python, C, ReactJS, and Kotlin, alongside a strong foundation in areas like:

Knowledge Graphs & Graph Databases
Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
Cloud Computing, Docker, Kubernetes
Computer Vision & Image Processing
Convolutional & Deep Neural Networks
Distributed Computing Systems & Data Science

In addition to these, I'm experienced with web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React JS, and databases like Neo4j, MySQL, and PostgreSQL.

I thrive in both team-based environments and independent projects, always focused on continuous learning and growth. I believe that mistakes are part of the learning journey, and I embrace them as opportunities to improve.

I am actively seeking Internship, Co-op and Full-time opportunities for Software Developer/Engineer roles, DevOps Engineer roles, Data Scientist roles where I can apply my skills and contribute meaningfully while continuously learning and adapting to new technologies. I am eager to collaborate with like-minded professionals in the IT sector to drive impactful projects.

about.bio: Experienced Full Stack Developer skilled in ReactJS, Spring Boot, MongoDB, and more. I've contributed to projects at Sephora, Agricultural Sciences UGA, and Quanteon Solutions, focusing on performance optimization and secure platform development.
about.tutor: I am a passionate tutor who loves to share my knowledge in a simple and explainable way. I believe that making complex topics easy to understand is key to helping students succeed, and I enjoy seeing them grow and learn.

work.title: Student Intern
work.description: Developed and implemented new UI screens using React with a Spring Boot backend for BlueYonder WMS, integrating via iframes, enhancing user interactions with a comprehensive knowledge of Restful Services. Migrated JDA WMS backend code (MOCA) to Java with Spring Boot, incorporating single-token authentication methodologies and aligning with Restful Services to facilitate seamless operation of React screens.

work.title: Internship
work.description: Contributed to FlowScript.AI by developing using NodeJS and ReactTS, reducing complexity in web app creation via intuitive English prompts while maintaining a strong understanding of the project scope and alignments with business needs. Onboarded over 1,000 users to the pre-launch platform, showcasing effective stakeholder collaboration.
